sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Teltonika Modems enable internet connection using GSM, 3G or LTE networks. They run OpenWrt based, feature rich, open source firmware.

sections.title: Command Line Interface (CLI)
sections.content: Modem can be accessed via command line interface (CLI)

sections.title: Communicate with the modem via gsmctl
sections.content:
From CLI communication with the modem is possible with gsmctl. The programm can be used to gather network information.

```
$ gsmctl -h
```

To see options.

sections.title: SMS
sections.content: SMS can be sent with gsmctl

sections.title: See also
sections.content:
- There is a very good wiki by Teltonika.
- The manufacturer provides a sofware development kit
- Modems can be configured to be controlled with SMS
- Configuration is possible with UCI commands
